form.current-chamber: IN THE SENATE OF THE UNITED STATES

action.action-desc: Mr. Vitter(for himself,Mr. Grassley,Mrs. Fischer, andMr. Sessions) introduced the following bill; which was read twice and referred to theCommittee on the Judiciary

form.official-title: To prohibit appropriated funds from being used in contravention of section 642(a) of the Illegal Immigration Reform and Immigrant Responsibility Act of 1996.

section.header: Restriction of COPS funding for sanctuary cities
section.text: None of the amounts appropriated in any Act for the Community Oriented Policing Services Program may be used in contravention of section 642(a) of the Illegal Immigration Reform and Immigrant Responsibility Act of 1996(8 U.S.C. 1373(a)).
